 * blueprintmanager reset 'player name or id' - resets blueprints for player
 * blueprintmanager unlock 'player name or id' 'item shortname' - unlock specified blueprint for player
 * blueprintmanager unlockall 'player name or id'- unlocks all blueprints for player
